system.description: You cast a handful of salt into the fire and use the patterns of the flames to divine the moment where you will either help or hinder. If you perform this reading for a friendly creature (including yourself), the next time that creature fails a saving throw or ability check in the next 8 hours, they may immediately reroll the triggering save or check and add your spellcasting modifier to the roll. If you perform this reading for an unfriendly creature and they succeed on a saving throw or ability check, they must immediately reroll the triggering save or check, subtracting your spellcasting modifier from the roll. The triggering creature must use the result of the second roll, even if it is worse.
system.materials: a source of flame and a handful of salt
